title: Bug 18285Doubleclicking on import statement transfers to referenced type
OB: Bug 18285Doubleclicking on import statement transfers to referenced type Build 20020528In the package view outline, doubleclicking on a type import statement doesopen the editor on the target type, instead of the unit hosting the importreference.
